Some Asian societies, including Vietnam, can harbor ugly stigmas against their HIV-positive members due to obsolete attitudes and widespread lack of medical knowledge. In this long video feature, one of the most honest and articulate of its kind, a vlogger opens up about his life as an openly gay and HIV-positive young South Korean, and how he uses YouTube as a platform to bring about awareness of his condition.
